favourite.article: We want nothing other than Christ!! His blood is so precious!!!!
Thank you for such wonderful lyrics..it's towards Passover and we're celebrating His death and thankful to God for letting His only begotten son to redeem us with His precious Blood.
I am so greatful, I have been searching for the lyrics of this hymn and tried calling my school mates to remind where I cuild get the copy of this song. Thank you. God bless you.
Thought of this great old hymn when studying 1 Peter 1:18-19 but could not find it. Thanks for keeping them alive. Nothing will purchase our redemption except the precious blood of Christ!
What a beautiful and well composed hymn. It exults the name of Jesus and His blood.

I was looking for this song this Morning 'I am redeemed but not With silver..' Using Google and clicked on the first one I saw and it was your site. I was so surprised. What a blessing. I Can listen, play myself using the chords, Both guitar and piano...you guys have done this Well. God bless you so muchüíù Thank you. I Will definately Tell others about. Again, God bless you indeed. I am so grateful for being led To your site. And so blessed.
Let us always that our loving Jesus for His precious love that He died for us. Thanks for blessing us with this wonderful song. May God continue blessing you serve Him. Amen
It makes at the feet of Calvary, and tears too. Thank You Jesus for dying for me. Though gone far away from You for so long I can hear Your sweet voice calling me.

Came across this grand old hymn! Great words. Great truth contained in the hymn. Great memory. Took me back over 50 years. Great redemption: "The blood of the cross". The paltry currency of earth has no value in this great matter.

1 Peter 1:18-19 With all the talk to collect gold an silver today I say I'll put my trust in Christ Jesus alone for today and tomorrow and my eternity.
Our redemption is from Christ alone and I am so grateful! Praise His Holy Name.
Thank you so much for this website. We are praying for you as you minister to many of us with your offerings of free Christian midi.
Hallelujah for the blood of Jesus!
